channel.title: I need some help
channel.description: I weigh about 185 and 5'11. I wanted to loose some weight, any advice?

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Eat McDonalds daily.

Well not really, just eat healthy shit. Work out (not a lot, unless you want to do a lot, just a little bit every day or whatever works for you).

Read full topic

item.title: I need some help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I lost a lot of weight with eating correct meals at dinner, and I ran everyday for about a mile around a 500 meter track for two 4 weeks. Try working out regularly, lifting weights, running, cardio mainly. Also, try joining a sport such as swimming, it’s great for loosing weight and toning the body, or take up a martial art.

Also, it’s best to eat in small portions. And try to eat things like Fish, Chicken, and Turkey are all good things for loosing weight. And at dinner eat a good enough portion so you feel satisfied with yourself and not so you feel bloated.

And also, before you do anything durastic like that, take your build and your frame into account too.

Like me, I’m 6’2, and 168 pounds. But I have a larger frame.

Read full topic
